creator: Ritchie Bros.
descriptionHtml:
Search, register and bid at Ritchie Bros. auctions around the world on your Android mobile devices! Buy new and used heavy equipment and trucks for sale at our live unreserved public auctions from your home, office or jobsite. As long as you're connected you can bid.

- Browse tens of thousands of items for sale
- Track equipment and get notifications with watchlists
- Check detailed equipment information & photos
- Bid online in real time
- View live auctions and see what's selling
- Hear the auctioneer with live streaming audio

Ritchie Bros. is the world’s largest industrial auctioneer, conducting hundreds of live unreserved public auctions each year, with both onsite and online bidding.
Learn more at rbauction.com.



By tapping the button or by downloading the Ritchie Bros. app published by Ritchie Bros., you agree to the app User License Agreement [www.rbauction.com/mobile-eula] and consent to the installation of this app further described above and to its future updates and upgrades. Search, register and bid at Ritchie Bros. auctions around the world on your Android mobile devices! Buy new and used heavy equipment and trucks for sale at our live unreserved public auctions from your home, office or jobsite. As long as you're connected you can bid.

- Browse tens of thousands of items for sale
- Track equipment and get notifications with watchlists
- Check detailed equipment information & photos
- Bid online in real time
- View live auctions and see what's selling
- Hear the auctioneer with live streaming audio

Ritchie Bros. is the world’s largest industrial auctioneer, conducting hundreds of live unreserved public auctions each year, with both onsite and online bidding.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Happy New Year everyone, we hope it brings you good fortune.


To kick off the year we're doing a small release with two features:

* the ability to virtually walk around, under, and into select assets that are for sale. Look for the '360' icon in the Item Details screen.

* for our VIP customers an easier way to access the full list of benefits that come with the VIP Card. Just tap on it.

descriptionHtml:
Search, register, and bid at Ritchie Bros. auctions—the world’s largest industrial auctioneer—right from your Android mobile device! Buy new and used heavy equipment, trucks, and machinery at live unreserved public auctions. Whether you’re at home, in the office, or on the jobsite, you can browse and bid with ease.

Top Features:
Browse tens of thousands of heavy equipment, trucks, and machinery for sale.
Track your favorite items with personalized watchlists and instant notifications.
View detailed equipment specs, photos, and inspection reports.
Bid online in real time, from anywhere in the world.
Watch live auctions and see what's selling.
Hear the excitement of the auctioneer with live streaming audio.

Why Ritchie Bros.?
Trusted by millions: We conduct hundreds of unreserved auctions every year.
Global reach: Access items from all over the world in one place.
Hassle-free bidding: Participate online or in person at our public auctions.

Get Started Today:
Explore our app and discover unbeatable deals on construction equipment, industrial machinery, trucks, and more. Your next great buy is just a bid away!
Learn more at rbauction.com.

Contact us for more information:
Phone: 1.778.331.5500
Email: csg@rbauction.com
